programme.title: Bun Dummy
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E21, Doug hates Carrie's new hairstyle but can't bring himself to tell her the truth; Spence dreads an upcoming reunion with a former teacher.

programme.title: Patrons Ain't
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E22, When their accountant makes them feel guilty about their lack of charitable donations, Doug and Carrie decide to make a large donation to a school library.

programme.title: Eddie Money
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E23, Doug tries to keep $5,000 in gambling winnings a secret from Carrie, who didn't want him betting to begin with; Carrie is offered a new job. Eddie Money guest stars.

programme.title: Two Thirty
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E24, When Doug goes to Dr. Farber (Tim Matheson) for a root canal, he finds out Carrie used to have a major crush on the dentist.

programme.title: Shrink Wrap
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E25, Carrie and Doug send Arthur to a psychiatrist (William Hurt), to whom he reveals his relationship with his father (Ben Stiller).

programme.title: Window Pain
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E01, Carrie becomes obsessed with trying to convince the new neighbors that she and Doug don't constantly fight.

programme.title: Arthur, Spooner
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E02, Team leader Carrie grows frustrated with her drab work group; Doug begins relying on Arthur's company in order to fall asleep.

programme.title: Kirbed Enthusiasm
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E03, Doug agrees to try out for a semiprofessional football league if Kirby will stay with peewee football.

programme.title: Holy Mackerel
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E04, Carrie's prayer for a raise is miraculously answered while in church, prompting her and Doug to start asking God to grant wishes.

programme.title: Jung Frankenstein
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E05, Carrie gives Doug's therapist (guest star Dave Foley) a laundry list of bad habits to work on. Arthur fights an addiction to nasal spray.

programme.title: Mammary Lane
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E06, Carrie baby-sits for the boss' son; Doug tries to make friends with the new shoe girl (Rachel Dratch) at the bowling alley.

programme.title: Business Affairs
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E07, Doug gets jealous of Carrie's gay co-worker; both Doug and Carrie worry about the strength of their marriage as they sign a 30-year mortgage plan.

programme.title: Flash Photography
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E08, As a joke, Doug takes a lewd picture with a disposable camera on the table at a wedding. David Eigenberg guest stars.

programme.title: Flame Resistant
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E09, Carrie finds out Doug's high-school sweetheart (guest star Lola Glaudini) still keeps in touch with his mother.

programme.title: Connect Four
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E10, After Carrie wins four Knicks tickets, she and Doug struggle to find a couple to double-date with that they can both get along with.

programme.title: Mentalo Case
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E11, Doug recalls his childhood toy, Mentalo; Arthur sends Holly to find the perfect gift for his daughter.

programme.title: Loaner Car
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E12, Doug loans Carrie to Deacon for a couple of days to help him get ready for his big Thanksgiving dinner.

programme.title: Golden Moldy
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E13, Doug downplays a mold problem in the basement so he and Carrie can go on a last-minute Caribbean vacation.

programme.title: S'Poor House
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E14, When insurance won't cover the mold problem, Doug asks his dad for money, leaving Arthur insulted because he didn't come to him. Anne Meara guest stars.

programme.title: Attention Deficit
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E15, Doug tries to prove to Carrie that he thinks about her all the time; friends threaten to ditch Doug's Super Bowl party for a co-worker's.

programme.title: Steve Moscow
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E16, After tearing apart the Heffernans' walls, a contractor has a dispute with Doug and disappears, leaving things a mess.

programme.title: Animal Attraction
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E17, Doug has to transport penguins to the Albany zoo, forcing him to cancel romantic Valentine's Day plans with Carrie.

programme.title: Prints Charming
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E18, Doug and Carrie feel insecure about their lives after they accidentally pick up the exciting pictures of another couple.

programme.title: Cowardly Lyin'
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E19, When Doug gets caught in a lie to avoid going to the opera, he and Carrie decide to be honest with each other in the future.

programme.title: Driving Reign
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E20, A relative rivalry erupts after Doug reluctantly helps get his cousin Danny promoted to driver at IPS; Holly accidentally insults Arthur.

programme.title: Clothes Encounter
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E21, Carrie can't stop buying expensive clothes, and then taking them back to the shops within a few days. Meanwhile, Spence's new girlfriend is so afraid of his dog she tells him to decide who he wants, the dog or her.

programme.title: Queens'bro Bridge
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E22, After discovering that Arthur and his estranged half brother, Skitch (guest star Shelley Berman), inherited their aunt's home 10 years ago, Doug hatches a plan to reunite the siblings and get them to move in together.

programme.title: Dog Shelter
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E23, Carrie discovers Doug's parents have shielded him from the truth for years by replacing his dog with look-alikes.

programme.title: Taste Buds
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E24, Upset about not getting his way after Carrie agrees to Arthur's choices for dinner and a movie rental, Doug tries to manipulate him into wanting the same things he does.

programme.title: Bed Spread
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E25, Doug and Carrie borrow twin beds while waiting for a new bed to be delivered and discover that doing things separately has advantages.

programme.title: Doug Less I
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E01, Newly slim Doug surprises Carrie with a romantic getaway to a resort in the mountains, but she discovers that he had been there with an old girlfriend.

programme.title: Doug Less II
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E02, Newly slim Doug surprises Carrie with a romantic getaway to a resort in the mountains, but she discovers that he had been there with an old girlfriend.

programme.title: King Pong
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E03, Doug asks Arthur to train him at ping-pong so that he can beat Carrie, and Spence is jealous when his girlfriend is promoted to waitress at the bowling alley.

programme.title: Dreading Vows
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E04, Doug and Carrie decide to renew their wedding vows, then try to cancel the ceremony; Arthur debates keeping his wedding present for himself.

programme.title: Nocturnal Omission
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E05, Doug decides not to ruin Deacon's weekend with a beautiful stewardess by telling him about his ex-wife's plans.

programme.title: Affidavit Justice
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E06, When the partners of Carrie's law firm notice Doug's softball skills, they ask him to pretend he is a lawyer and play on the company team; Arthur believes his great-grandfather was a slave owner.

programme.title: Secret Garden
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E07, Carrie's relationship with her gynecologist (Judge Reinhold) is in jeopardy when Doug's cousin charges the doctor more than he quoted for landscaping work.

programme.title: The Cranemakers
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E16, Soon to be a father, Frasier, takes a retreat to become one with nature.

programme.title: Hot Rocks
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E17, Sam and Rebecca are dressed-up for the USS Constitution tour, but their respective dates cancel.

programme.title: What's Up Doc?
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E18, Sam makes a move for a sex therapist, but gets turned down cold.

programme.title: The Gift Of The Woodi
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E19, Woody can't live up to the gift-giving expectations for his girlfriend's birthday.

programme.title: Call Me Irresponsible
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E20, Carla questions her marriage when Eddie is a no-show on their anniversary.

programme.title: Sisterly Love
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E21, Rebecca and her estranged sister teach Sam a humiliating lesson.

programme.title: The Visiting Lecher
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E22, Frasier's colleague visits Boston and makes an enemy out of Rebecca.

programme.title: The Improbable Dream (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E01, Sam almost gets his chance at a date with Rebecca, until a handsome corporate raider steps in.

programme.title: The Improbable Dream (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E02, Rebecca takes a trip to Beverly Hills with Robin on his Lear jet.

programme.title: A Bar Is Born
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E03, Sam considers opening a bar of his own to give his life purpose.

programme.title: How To Marry A Mailman
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E04, When Cliff accepts his girlfriend's marriage proposal, his fear of commitment turns him into a wreck.

programme.title: The Two Faces Of Norm
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E05, While Sam regrets the hasty sale of his Corvette, Norm learns that being the boss is harder than it looks.

programme.title: Sam Ahoy
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E06, Sam, Carla and Norm set sail in Robin Colcord's boat, only to discover there's a live bomb on board.

programme.title: The Stork Brings A Crane
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E07, While the bar's patrons and management celebrate Cheers' 100-year anniversary, Lilith gives birth to a baby boy.

programme.title: Death Takes A Holiday On Ice
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E08, Following Eddie's untimely death, Carla discovers her husband was two-timing her when she meets his other wife at the funeral.

programme.title: For Real Men Only
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E09, Frasier kidnaps his own son to keep him from being ritually circumcised in the Jewish tradition.

programme.title: Two Girls For Every Boyd
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E10, The guys at Cheers have a beard-growing contest to test their manhood.

programme.title: The Art Of The Steal
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E11, When Rebecca's plan to surprise Robin Colcord with a romantic evening backfires, she ends up trapped in Robin's penthouse with Sam.

programme.title: Feeble Attraction
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E12, While Norm's ex-secretary falls for Cliff, Rebecca searches for "hidden treasure" in a gift from Robin.

programme.title: Sammy And The Professor
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E13, Rebecca's favorite college professor comes to visit, and much to her disbelief, has a brief affair with Sam.

programme.title: What Is... Cliff Clavin
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E14, Cliff gets hauled off the stage when he's a contestant on Jeopardy.

programme.title: Finally! (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E15, Rebecca finds out that she's not the only woman in Robin's love life.

programme.title: Finally! (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E16, Rebecca finds out that she's not the only woman in Robin's love life.

programme.title: Woody Or Won't He?
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E17, Woody's girlfriend's mother, a beautiful older woman, makes sexual advances toward him.

programme.title: Severe Crane Damage
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E18, Frasier is upset when Lilith's new book labels him a boring, dependable "good boy."

programme.title: Indoor Fun With Sammy And Robby
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E19, Rebecca's plans for a romantic day with Robin are ruined when he opts to spend the day in a game of one-upmanship with Sam.

programme.title: Fifty-Fifty Carla
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E20, Carla is consumed with guilt when she hides the money from her late husband's estate from his other widow.

programme.title: Bar Wars III: Return Of Tecumseh
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E21, Then the gang notices that the bar's wooden statue of Tecumseh is missing. Their rival Gary is the suspected culprit.

programme.title: Loverboyd
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E22, Woody gives Kelly a promise ring when her father arranges for her to go to Europe.

programme.title: The Ghost And Mrs. Lebec
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E23, Carla fears Eddie's ghost is haunting her when she decides to begin dating again.

programme.title: Mr. Otis Regrets
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E24, Sam believes he's finally tricked Rebecca into spending the night with him, but ultimately learns the joke is on him.

programme.title: Cry Hard
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E25, After Robin asks Rebecca to move in with him, she learns he's been using her to plan a hostile takeover of her corporation.

programme.title: Cry Harder
programme.desc: Cheers, S08E26, Sam regains ownership of the bar, as well as a long-awaited chance with Rebecca, when he turns Robin over to the authorities for insider trading.

programme.title: Love Is A Really, Really Perfectly Okay Thing
programme.desc: Cheers, S09E01, Robin unexpectedly returns after running out on Rebecca and the law.

programme.title: Chile 1: Imilac & Vaca Muerta
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Chile 1: Imilac & Vaca Muerta, S02E02, In the first-ever overseas Meteorite Men episode Steve and Geoff revisit the very site where their hunting partnership began way back in 1997: the Imilac pallasite strewnfield high in Chile's Atacama Desert.

programme.title: Chile 2: Monturaqui Crater & San Juan
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Chile 2: Monturaqui Crater & San Juan, S02E03, Geoff's "meteorite dream" comes true during this second Chile episode when the guys find their way to the Atacama Desert's remote Monturaqui Crater, and camp overnight on the floor of the stunning 100,000 year-old impact site.

programme.title: Utah Fireball
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Utah Fireball, S02E04, When hundreds of people see a nighttime fireball over Salt Lake City, Steve and Geoff race to Utah. After searching and communicating with radar expert Rob Matson, they conclude any surviving meteorites must have landed on military property.

programme.title: Wisconsin Fireball
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Wisconsin Fireball, S02E05, The guys are on their way to the Northeast Astronomy Forum in New York for a personal appearance, when a large fireball is seen over rural Wisconsin. Geoff continues on to NEAF to hold down the fort, while Steve begins an all-night drive to the fall site.

programme.title: Sweden
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Sweden, S02E06, Geoff and Steve cross the Arctic Circle on one of their most daring expeditions yet. With the help of a Swedish meteorite-hunting family, the guys attempt to uncover ancient space rocks that were transported by glaciers during the last Ice Age.

programme.title: Australia 2: Mundrabilla
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Australia 2: Mundrabilla, S02E07, Steve and Geoff head on an ambitious expedition. On the far side of the world, they cross the Nullarbor Plainand reach the remote Mundrabilla strewnfield. They team up with Australian meteorite specialist Dr. Andy Tomkins.

programme.title: Australia 1: Henbury Craters
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Australia 1: Henbury Craters, S02E08, In the Season Two finale Geoff and Steve journey to one of the most remarkable meteorite sites on the planet—the Henbury Crater field in central Australia.

programme.title: Pultusk, Poland
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Pultusk, Poland, S03E01, In this episode, Geoff and Steve travel over 6,000 miles to eastern Poland in hopes of securing a piece of one of the most famous meteorite falls in history.

programme.title: Morasko, Poland
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Morasko, Poland, S03E02, 5,000 years ago, an enormous meteorite cascaded over Poland scarring the landscape with seven massive craters. For the first time, Geoff and Steve receive exclusive access to investigate the magnificent Morasko crater field.

programme.title: Return to Sweden
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Return to Sweden, S03E03, On this episode, Geoff and Steve make their epic return to northern Sweden in order to reclaim victory north of the Arctic Circle.

programme.title: Dronino, Russia
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Dronino, Russia, S03E04, The Kremlin, St. Basil's Cathedral, the Red Square, and of course, shots of vodka... for the first time, Geoff and Steve make the journey to Russia in search of one of the most rare and valuable meteorites on the planet—the Dronino ataxite.

programme.title: Homestead
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Homestead, S03E05, Geoff and Steve set out to uncover a forgotten extraterrestrial treasure from the cornfields of Amana, Iowa. On February 12, 1875 the legendary "detonating space rock" hurled through the air and exploded six times over the farm fields of Iowa.

programme.title: Return to Whitecourt
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Return to Whitecourt, S03E06, An important scientific mission summons the Meteorite Men back to Canada.

programme.title: Mojave
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Mojave, S03E07, Geoff and Steve venture to one of the country's meteorite capitals: Arizona, home of over 93 different space rocks. To better understand this phenomenon, the guys investigate the Mecca of meteorites, Franconia.

programme.title: Sahuarita, Arizona
programme.desc: Meteorite Men: Sahuarita, Arizona, S03E08, A hot tip sends the guys to southern Arizona in order to investigate a possible cold find.

programme.title: Danger, Astreroids Ahead
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Danger, Astreroids Ahead, S02E07, The question often rises is the cost of space exploration really worth it? Could the money be better spent elsewhere.

programme.title: Interface
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Interface, S03E10, The Ionisphere, where the Earth interfaces with space, is little understood, it effects radio communications, GPS signals and satellites alike.
MOON SHINE, S05E02, The International drive to return to the Moon is gathering pace, this multi- nation effort is readying to return, stay and utilise the Lunar assets.

programme.title: Mars: Adapt Or Leave
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Mars: Adapt Or Leave, S02E05, As the latest successes and failures come and go Mars continues to give up her secrets.

programme.title: Getting There
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Getting There, S02E02, Launching payloads into space is a very difficult task, historically rocket launches are the proverbial 'swords into ploughshares'.

programme.title: Birthday Girl
programme.desc: The First 48, 20240505174000 +0000, A 14-year-old Cleveland girl dies at her own birthday party when gunmen fire on a crowd; homicide detectives race to track down multiple shooters in the crime.

programme.title: Massacre in Little Haiti; Exposed
programme.desc: The First 48, 20240505183300 +0000, Miami police detectives hope the two survivors of a corner-store massacre can identify the shooter who killed two others; a Cleveland man is found strangled in his apartment.

programme.title: Bound and Burned
programme.desc: The First 48, 20240505192300 +0000, A Dallas police detective must unravel a robbery plot when the body of an expectant father is found bound and burned in a creek bed.

programme.title: Bad Medicine
programme.desc: The First 48, 20240505201400 +0000, A New Orleans woman and her 4-year-old grandson are shot in her bedroom; the crime is investigated as the child struggles to survive.

programme.title: Graveyard Love
programme.desc: The First 48, 20240505210700 +0000, A New Orleans man is shot in front of his grandmother's home, and police detectives believe a woman close to the victim may have arranged the crime.

programme.title: Blood Red; Deadly Moves
programme.desc: The First 48, 20240505220000 +0000, Two Dallas men on their way to visit family are gunned down; a police detective searches for a burglar who strangled a Cleveland preacher.

programme.title: Killer Debt; House of Rage
programme.desc: The First 48, 20240505225000 +0000, Miami detectives investigate the case of man gunned down on a city sidewalk; police reach out to a Cleveland community for help after a mother of five gets shot in her apartment.

programme.title: Birthday Girl

The Definitive Guide to the Mob, 20240506040000 +0000, Former Colombo family captain Michael Franzese describes how one gets in, gets made, and makes money in the American mafia.

programme.title: John Gotti
programme.desc: Kingpin, 20240506054200 +0000, In 1980s New York, two opposing factions of the American Mafia split the Gambino crime family down the middle; the old school and the new school struggle against one another; one murderous capo emerges as the Boss of Bosses.

programme.title: The Shadow Kingpin: Bartolome Moya
programme.desc: Gangsters: America's Most Evil, 20240506072600 +0000, Moya and his chief enforcer, Andre Paige, led a deadly narcotics and extortion racket in New York City.

programme.title: The Mongol Warlord : Ruben "Doc" Cavazos
programme.desc: Gangsters: America's Most Evil, 20240506081700 +0000, Federal agents say Doc's aim was to take on the Hells Angels and run a massive criminal enterprise engaged in drug running, murder and intimidation.

programme.title: Sex, Money, Murder, Inc.: "Pistol Pete" Rollack
programme.desc: Gangsters: America's Most Evil, 20240506090800 +0000, Pistol Pete and his underlings incorporated the gang Sex, Money, Murder in an effort to launder drug money and expanded their operations outside New York.
